Articles.Content:
I was wondering if anyone can help me obtain copies of the two version of the Demo listed in the title of this post.

I already have the 0.18.3 and 1.0 versions, and would really like to acquire the last two to complete my collection.  I contacted Squad hoping they may be able to help but unfortunately they no longer have them on their computers.  However they did say if I could find them elsewhere, I could ask for copies, and I do have the email which I can show to proof this to be the case.

If anyone can help me with this I'd be very much appreciated.

Thanks everyone.

I have only the 0.18.3 (all the 3: Win32, MacOS and Linux).

Since Squad said you can ask for copies for the ones you don't know, may I ask for the 1.0?

For the sake of completude, I have these ones:

https://steamdb.info/app/231410/depots/

Edited April 26, 2020 by Lisias
added link
I could send you the installer, how would you like it to be done?

On 4/26/2020 at 12:57 PM, The Flying Kerbal said:

I could send you the installer, how would you like it to be done?

Any file sharing will do - dropbox, googledrive . If possible, one that I don't need to create a new account.  

Thanks!
No problem, I'll sort it out tomorrow.
